mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ep_timing_charge ( ELPI_ELECTRICPILECODE, TIMING_CHARGE, TIMING_CHARGE_STATUS, ISSUED_STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE )values( #{elpiElectricpilecode}, #{chargeTime}, #{status}, #{issuedStatus}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_ep_timing_charge where ELPI_ELECTRICPILECODE = #{elpiElectricpilecode}
